[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||40px|||” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]

At Family Promise, we spend every day talking with families who have experienced or are at risk of homelessness. We believe that sharing their stories is essential to spreading awareness about family homelessness in the United States. Want to learn more? Check out our recent media coverage below.

Need to speak with an expert on family homelessness? We can connect you with staff at our national office or one of our 200+ Affiliates across the United States.

Please contact:

Katie Coughlin, Marketing & Media Manager

908-273-1100, ext. 115

Send Katie a Message here

 

Want to learn more about family homelessness in America?

You can view our Press Kit.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Guardian3.jpg” title_text=”Guardian3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding=”29px|||||” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Recent News Coverage ” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]
